import styled from 'styled-components' import Input from '../components/Input' const StyledForm = styled.form` ` const Divider = styled.hr` border: none; height: 3px; width: 40%; text-align: left; background: ${props => props.theme.red}; margin: 1em 0; margin-bottom: 2em; ` const FormFields = styled.div` /* display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-between; */ display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 2.4rem 2.4rem; ` // May not need this because we're using display: grid now const FormFieldRow = styled.div` /* display: flex; justify-content: space-between; */ ` const FormField = styled.div` /* max-width: 1000px; */ /* margin-bottom: 2.4rem; width: 100%; */ ` const Form = () => (
